channel.title: Noob needs help on making a server
channel.description: yesterday i tried making a server, but i had to leave my helper. He is now off and i have to start from the beggining. I need someone thath can walk me through the process step by step. If any1 can help me plz post. I would appreciate it.

item.title: Noob needs help on making a server
item.dc:creator: @Snark Snark
item.description:
@Snark wrote:

You edit the Java inside of them, They arent just “notepads” they are .java files used to run the server, along with the “notepads” you should’ve recieved a couple of bat files and some folders.

Follow this guide if you need help with your server Ultimate Server Guide (By Mod Taharok)

Read full topic
